caption.p: “Covid-19 related delays” in treating ST-elevation myocardial infarction (STEMI) patients. Adapted from Ibanez et al., 2017 European Society of Cardiology Guidelines for the management of acute myocardial infarction in patients presenting with ST-segment elevation [ 70]. Abbreviations: Covid-19: coronavirus disease; EMS: emergency medical services; FMC: first medical contact; PCI: percutaneous coronary intervention; STEMI: ST-elevation myocardial infarction.
